```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggbio)
library(GenomicRanges)
```

## Visualizing Allignments onto the genome




``` {r Doyle}
Doyle <- read.table("EOG091H02QUDoyle.bed",header = FALSE)
colnames(Doyle) <- c('chr','start','end','id','score','strand')

gRanges <- with(Doyle,GRanges(chr,IRanges(start+1,end),strand,score,id=id))


readplot <- ggplot(gRanges)+stat_stepping(geom="segment")
readplot
ggsave("Doyle.png")

```
